name: Finset.sup_eq_zero
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedAddCommMonoid α
inst✝ : CanonicallyOrderedAdd α
s : Finset ι
f : ι → α
⊢ Iff (Eq (s.sup f) 0) (∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → Eq (f i) 0)
decl: @[simp] lemma sup_eq_zero : s.sup f = 0 ↔ ∀ i ∈ s, f i = 0 := by simp [← bot_eq_zero']

name: Finset.sup'_eq_zero
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
α : Type u_2
inst✝¹ : LinearOrderedAddCommMonoid α
inst✝ : CanonicallyOrderedAdd α
s : Finset ι
f : ι → α
hs : s.Nonempty
⊢ Iff (Eq (s.sup' hs f) 0) (∀ (i : ι), Membership.mem s i → Eq (f i) 0)
decl: @[simp] lemma sup'_eq_zero (hs) : s.sup' hs f = 0 ↔ ∀ i ∈ s, f i = 0 := by simp [sup'_eq_sup]
